data.name: ConversationControl_Display_Key
data.value: Conversation Control

data.name: ConversationControl_Desc_Key
data.value: Control to show a subGrid of records as a conversation.

data.name: Dataset_Display_Key
data.value: DataSet

data.name: Property_TextColumn_Display_Key
data.value: Text column

data.name: Property_TextColumn_Desc_Key
data.value: Name of the view column (field name) that holds the text that should be shown on the message.

data.name: Property_SenderColumn_Display_Key
data.value: Sender column

data.name: Property_SenderColumn_Desc_Key
data.value: Name of the view column (field name) that holds the sender identifier.

data.name: Property_DateColumn_Display_Key
data.value: Date column

data.name: Property_DateColumn_Desc_Key
data.value: Name of the view column (field name) that holds the date information that should be shown on the message.

data.name: Property_ReadColumn_Display_Key
data.value: Read Column

data.name: Property_ReadColumn_Desc_Key
data.value: Name of the view column (field name) that holds the information whether the message was read by the customer. Can be Two Option or Date.

data.name: Property_PublishedColumn_Display_Key
data.value: Published column

data.name: Property_PublishedColumn_Desc_Key
data.value: Name of the view column (field name) that holds the information whether the message was published to the customer. Can be Two Option or Date.

data.name: Property_HasAttachmentsColumn_Display_Key
data.value: Has attachments column

data.name: Property_HasAttachmentsColumn_Desc_Key
data.value: Name of the view column (field name) that holds the information whether the message has attachments.

data.name: Property_HasErrorColumn_Display_Key
data.value: Has errors column

data.name: Property_HasErrorColumn_Desc_Key
data.value: Name of the view column (field name) that holds the information whether the message has errors.

data.name: Property_SenderNameColumn_Display_Key
data.value: Sender name column

data.name: Property_SenderNameColumn_Desc_Key
data.value: Name of the view column (field name) that holds the name of the sender.

data.name: Property_CustomerIdentifier_Display_Key
data.value: Customer Identifier

data.name: Property_CustomerIdentifier_Desc_Key
data.value: The Id of the OptionSet value that identifies the sender as a customer. Can be a comma separated list of several values.

data.name: Property_MaxHeight_Display_Key
data.value: Max height

data.name: Property_MaxHeight_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the maximal height the control (inner conversation container) should have. Will only be used when a scroolbar is shown.

data.name: Property_SentMessageBgColor_Display_Key
data.value: Sent message background color

data.name: Property_SentMessageBgColor_Desc_Key
data.value: The color a sent message should have. Has to be a valid css value.

data.name: Property_SentMessageHasErrorBgColor_Display_Key
data.value: Sent message with error background color

data.name: Property_SentMessageHasErrorBgColor_Desc_Key
data.value: The color a sent message with errors should have. Has to be a valid css value.

data.name: Property_SentMessageNotPublishedBgColor_Display_Key
data.value: Sent message not published background color

data.name: Property_SentMessageNotPublishedBgColor_Desc_Key
data.value: The color a sent message that was not yet published should have. Has to be a valid css value.

data.name: Property_SentMessageTextColor_Display_Key
data.value: Sent message text color

data.name: Property_SentMessageTextColor_Desc_Key
data.value: The color the text of a sent message should have. Has to be a valid css value.

data.name: Property_SentMessageHasErrorTextColor_Display_Key
data.value: Sent message with error text color

data.name: Property_SentMessageHasErrorTextColor_Desc_Key
data.value: The color the text of a sent message with error should have. Has to be a valid css value.

data.name: Property_ReceivedMessageBgColor_Display_Key
data.value: Received message background color

data.name: Property_ReceivedMessageBgColor_Desc_Key
data.value: The color a received message should have. Has to be a valid css value.

data.name: Property_SentMessageMetadataTextColor_Display_Key
data.value: Sent message metadata text color

data.name: Property_SentMessageMetadataTextColor_Desc_Key
data.value: The color the metadata of a sent message should have. Has to be a valid css value.

data.name: Property_SentMessageHasErrorMetadataTextColor_Display_Key
data.value: Sent message with error metadata text color

data.name: Property_SentMessageHasErrorMetadataTextColor_Desc_Key
data.value: The color the metadata of a sent message with error should have. Has to be a valid css value.

data.name: Property_ReceivedMessageTextColor_Display_Key
data.value: Received message text color

data.name: Property_ReceivedMessageTextColor_Desc_Key
data.value: The color the text of a received message should have. Has to be a valid css value.

data.name: Property_ReceivedMessageMetadataTextColor_Display_Key
data.value: Received message metadata text color

data.name: Property_ReceivedMessageMetadataTextColor_Desc_Key
data.value: The color the metadata of a received message should have. Has to be a valid css value.

data.name: Property_SentMessageReadCheckmarkColor_Display_Key
data.value: Sent message read checkmark color

data.name: Property_SentMessageReadCheckmarkColor_Desc_Key
data.value: The color the checkmarks of a sent message should have if the message was read by the customer. Has to be a valid css value.

data.name: Property_SentMessageNotPublishedTextColor_Display_Key
data.value: Sent and not published message text color

data.name: Property_SentMessageNotPublishedTextColor_Desc_Key
data.value: The color the text of a sent and not published message should have. Has to be a valid css value.

data.name: Property_SentMessageNotPublishedMetaDataTextColor_Display_Key
data.value: Sent and not published message metadata color

data.name: Property_SentMessageNotPublishedMetaDataTextColor_Desc_Key
data.value: The color the metadata of a sent and not published message should have. Has to be a valid css value.

data.name: Property_OpenStrategy_Display_Key
data.value: Open strategy

data.name: Property_OpenStrategy_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines how the message should be opened.

data.name: Property_OpenStrategy_ModalCenter_Display_Key
data.value: Centered Modal

data.name: Property_OpenStrategy_ModalCenter_Desc_Key
data.value: The message will be opened in a modal that is centered

data.name: Property_OpenStrategy_ModalRight_Display_Key
data.value: Right Modal

data.name: Property_OpenStrategy_ModalRight_Desc_Key
data.value: The message will be opened in a modal that is aligned on the right side

data.name: Property_OpenStrategy_NewWindow_Display_Key
data.value: New window

data.name: Property_OpenStrategy_NewWindow_Desc_Key
data.value: The message will be opened in a new window

data.name: Property_OpenStrategy_CurrentTab_Display_Key
data.value: Current tab

data.name: Property_OpenStrategy_CurrentTab_Desc_Key
data.value: The message will be opened in the current tab

data.name: Property_ShowScrollbar_Display_Key
data.value: Show scrollbar

data.name: Property_ShowScrollbar_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines whether a scrollbar should be shown

data.name: Property_ModalWidth_Display_Key
data.value: Modal width

data.name: Property_ModalWidth_Desc_Key
data.value: The width (in %) the Modal should have.

data.name: Property_UseSubgridData_Display_Key
data.value: Use Subgrid data

data.name: Property_UseSubgridData_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines whether the control should use the subgrid data

data.name: Property_EntityName_Display_Key
data.value: Entity name

data.name: Property_EntityName_Desc_Key
data.value: Name of the entity that should be loaded when the control should not use the subgrid data. This field is required when the "Use Subgrid data" field is "no".

data.name: Property_LookUpColumn_Display_Key
data.value: Lookup Column

data.name: Property_LookUpColumn_Display_Key
data.value: Name of the column which contains the lookup to the between entity. This field is used when the "Use Subgrid data" field is set to no.

data.name: Property_ShowEmptyMessages_Display_Key
data.value: Show empty messages

data.name: Property_ShowEmptyMessages_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines whether empty messages should be shown.

data.name: Property_SortColumn_Display_Key
data.value: Sorting coloumn

data.name: Property_SortColumn_Desc_Key
data.value: The name of the coloumn the konversation should be sorted by. This field is required when the "Use Subgrid data" field is "no".

data.name: Property_SortOrder_Display_Key
data.value: Sorting order

data.name: Property_SortOrder_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines how the order of the sorting should be (ascending or descending). This field is required when the "Use Subgrid data" field is "no".

data.name: Wrong_Configuration
data.value: Wrong configuration

data.name: No_Record_Found
data.value: No data available.

data.name: LoadMore_ButtonLabel
data.value: Load more
